short_summary: Procurement of office furniture (height adjustable tables) for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police.
description: Office furniture procurement within the Canada region.
duration_in_months: It is mandatory to be finished up to 30 August 2024.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Details
* **Official/Contract Ref**: 202402094A
* **Publication Date**: June 18, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 3, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Details
* **Title (English)**: Office Furniture - Height Adjustable Tables
* **Title (French)**: Mobilier de bureau - Tables réglables en hauteur
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: July 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: August 30, 2024

## Tender Type
* **Type of Tender**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Supply Arrangement**: E60PQ-140003/C
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contact Information
* **Contracting Authority**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police
* **Name**: Joshua Knox
* **Email**: [joshua.knox@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:joshua.knox@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 791-9552

## Tender Description
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police has a requirement for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture, including height-adjustable tables, to the RCMP headquarters in Ottawa. The requirement is open to suppliers who are eligible to participate under the Government of Canada's Supply Arrangement (SA) framework. The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender. A security requirement is associated with this contract.

## Tender Documents
To obtain the tender documents, please visit the Canada Buys website and download the following files:
* [202402094---rfb---final-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40451/202402094---rfb---final-eng.pdf) (english)
* [202402094---rfb---final-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/40451/202402094---rfb---final-fr.pdf) (français)

Note: The Canadian government uses a specific template for their tender announcements. I've tried to rewrite the text to fit the template seen above, and to be more concise and professional. Please let me know if there is anything else I can
